name: wordslide-lambda-functions
description: AWS Lambda functions for WordSlide game backend

scripts.build: npm run build:auth && npm run build:game && npm run build:user
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wordslide-auth --zip-file fileb://auth.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wordslide-game --zip-file fileb://game.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wordslide-user --zip-file fileb://user.zip
